title: Yosemite National Park: Restoring a Meadow
body: Restoring a Meadow                         Restoring a Meadow Local American Indians, park fire managers, and blackberry weeders team up to save a meadow in danger of losing its unique native plants. (7:40)  Duration:7 minutes, 40 seconds           Â     Learn more about fire management in Yosemite.
